title: This is what I did on the weekend.

embed.description: Just a whole bunch of clips from a few games. I'm not good at editing, so this is just me messing around, also sorry for the audio quality, I'm really loud while the others are quiet. I need to learn to use Audacity or something while I'm recording, and normalizing everyone's audio.

body:
MA 15+ warning.

This is me messing around with editing n such.
Aaand, you guys have been warned.

replies.body:
A. The video's editing wasn't great ( but a good start )

B. I'm in to furries now.

Horrible video. 

11/10 subscribed.

lol XD

1: yeah Everyone has to start somewhere, teh subtitles and images was easy, the only was the "Fur%%%" Ignite bit, picking a song and trying to work the F*cking camera.

2: LOL (I did make a twitter poll and people said yes.)

------------------------------------

Yeah compared to what anyone who knew how to work adobe, (AND DIDN'T FUCK UP THE AUDIO FILES)
It's just meh.

and thank you lol.

I'm gonna try and release the how I edited it video, showing newer league youtubers how I did stuff and why I did it.
If you need any tips on editing or working a camera tool, feel free to hit me up.
Yeah I might do that, the camera is something I'm not use too
